column2: WellNest is a platform committed to providing you with the best solutions for all your medical wellness needs.
You can find the best hospitals near you by visiting our Hospitals page at https://yourwebsite.com/hospitals.html.

column1: What is the mission of WellNest?
column2: Our mission is to provide top-notch healthcare solutions and support for all your medical wellness needs.

column1: Where can I read the privacy policy?
column2: You can read our privacy policy at https://yourwebsite.com/terms.html.
You can leave your feedback by visiting our Feedback page at https://yourwebsite.com/feedback.html.

column1: How can I chat with support?
column2: You can chat with us live for any inquiries or support by visiting our Chat page at https://yourwebsite.com/chat.html.

column1: Where can I find the conditions of use?
column2: You can read the conditions of use for our services at https://yourwebsite.com/conditions.html.

column1: Where can I find the terms and conditions?
column2: You can understand the terms and conditions for using our services at https://yourwebsite.com/terms.html.
